name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 13
tagline: in which the party enters the Feywild
shortSummary: Following the worg trail, the party discovers the Nightsong Roots portal, slays a burning Hollow Man, and steps into the Feywild where thorn sprites and a flying archer ambush them.
longSummary: Continuing their pursuit across the Highmoor, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan follow the worg trail up and down ridges until it trends toward a strange fog-filled hollow around the roots of a massive fallen tree. At the Nightsong Roots, Yvan's elemental experiments on the hanging roots produce eerie chimes that Drou learns to replicate, opening a portal in the trunk from which a burning Hollow Man emerges; focusing on fire as the old rhyme advised, the party destroys the creature. Stepping through into the Feywild, they find themselves on a path through dense, dark forest where they are attacked by small feyâ€”a cluster of thornlike sprites and a flying archer firing ice arrows. After a tense skirmish, they defeat the ambushers and continue along the path, unnerved by the disquieting fey melody of a distant singing tree.
